page.title: 16Ten yrs of the Village Hall
page.content: On{18th May 1985}Costock celebrated the{10th anniversary}of the opening of the{Village Hall. The day started with a Coffee Morning organised by the{Women's Institute}and {Over Sixties Club,}whilst the{Youth {Club}organised some games on the playing field.In the afternoon there was a jousting exibition by{Nottingham {Jousting Association.}Then there was a tea party for the children in the village who were 11 and under,prepared by the{Playgroup Committee}and the{ {Church Council.}To end the day the{ {Village Hall Management Committee} arranged a dance with disco music from the 1960's. { Tea towels}were sold showing pictures of{buildings in Costock}to remind people of the day's events.
